title: Sound On: Climate Summit Wrap, Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: Climate Summit Wrap, Infrastructure
description:
Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Host Emily Wilkins discussed President Biden's 2 day virtual climate summit and infrastructure. Bloomberg's David Westin spoke to John Kerry, Special Presidential Envoy for Climate, and Congresswoman Eleanor Holmes Norton.v

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
